subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: An air-conditioning failure on Thursday led to sweltering conditions in San Antonio’s arena in Game 1 of the finals, and the Heat’s LeBron James watched the final minutes with leg cramps.
snippet: An air-conditioning failure on Thursday led to sweltering conditions in San Antonio’s arena in Game 1 of the finals, and the Heat’s LeBron James watched the final minutes with leg cramps.
